Staff

Administrative Support

Zakaria Kehel (ICARDA-Morocco) is helping us (and other groups) with administration.

© 2025 ICARDA Bioinformatics Group.

We are part of the International Center for Agricultural Research in the Dry Areas (ICARDA). Our headquarters are located in Beirut, Lebanon, and we have research activities worldwide.

Funding:
- Supported by the CGIAR
- Various grants and projects from international agricultural research organizations
